column5: I am on my laptop now, main pc's hd is probably toast. So I do a search for it, find it, and go to the MODIS site to look at ice conditions.  I get this:  Forbidden You don't have permission to access /modis/modis.cgi/modis on this server.  Apache/1.3.26 Server at coastwatch.glerl.noaa.gov Port 80  Can anyone else check it, and see if they can see the satellite images please?
Give me a link and I'll have a look see.
http://coastwatch.glerl.noaa.gov/modis/region_map.html  This is the one I think I have used over the last few years.

Crap......same for me......that sucks. I use that site almost daily!!!  Here's the link, maybe they're just having problems.....I hope!  http://coastwatch.glerl.noaa.gov/modis/mod...io.143.250m.jpg  This one kinda works, but its from way back......you can flip the pages and get to today though.  http://rapidfire.sci.gsfc.nasa.gov/subsets...ua.721.250m.jpg  Sinker
Uh Oh!!!!!  Notice to Users 	 Disclaimer  Last Update: 2008-01-16 (which is probably near the last time I visited this page)  http://coastwatch.glerl.noaa.gov/disclaimer.html
Thats strange Tom. Checked it earlier today and it came up. Must be a temporary glitch. I hope it is anyway.
guys if links screw up they may end up looking at  a non public location I am sure they will fix it up soon

looks like something wrong with the server, not that it's password protected.... That's a standard apache warning message(apache is an http server)  *** this was posted by Wendel, stupid shared comptuers lol ***
I hope its just a server problem, upgrade, or whatever, I liked looking at those images.
Its still down, hopefully it will be cleared up soon.
YES!!!! and I see more blue water. Boat ride time!
Sweet!  I called April 20th for ice out on simcoe way back in December.....its gonna be real close!!  Sinker

Gonna be about three weeks where I wanna go ! Still getting around the Temagami Lakes area on sleds. My realestate guy had a survey crew back into Loraine Lake Monday and Tuesday without issue.  Here's Mondays shot of that area.

I was hauling whities thru the ice on sunday.......and I'll be launching the boat this weekend. Gotta love Canada!!!  Still lots of  snow in the bush to melt too.......man what a year for high water!!  Sinker
